string.name: movePieceFromE2ToE4
string.comment:
movePieceFromE2ToE4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Kustināt figūru no e2 uz e4

string.name: moveKnightToC3
string.comment:
moveKnightToC3
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

string.name: dropARookAtB4
string.comment:
dropARookAtB4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Novietot torni lauciņā b4 (tikai Crazyhouse variantā)

string.name: readOutOpponentName
string.comment:
readOutOpponentName
Press a button on the keyboard to hear the opponent's name aloud. The feature is most useful for blind players.

resources.string: Ja nepazīstiet augšup redzamo gājienu pierakstu, varat uzzināt vairāk šeit:
Pievienot \"x\", lai atzīmētu nokaušanu, nav obligāti

string.name: bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
string.comment:
bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
Only the Latin character 'o' works.

resources.string: Var lietot gan burtu \"o\", gan ciparu nulle (0), lai veiktu rokādi
Ja rokāde atļauta abos virzienos, spiediet ievades taustiņu, lai roķētos karaļa pusē
Burtu lielums svarīgs tikai tad, ja tas nepieciešams, lai atšķirtu b-rindas bandinieku no laidņa (simbols B)
Lai veiktu priekšgājienu, vienkārši ievadiet vēlamo gājienu pirms pienākusi jūsu kārta
